forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this morning will give way to cloudy skies and rain during the afternoon. High 8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this morning will give way to cloudy skies and rain during the afternoon. High 47F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 4C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Low near 40F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. High 7C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High near 45F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 4C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low near 40F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 6C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 42F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 4C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low around 40F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High near 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 42F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain with some snow mixing in late. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Evening rain followed by a mix of rain and snow late. Low 37F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning changing to rain late. High near 5C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning changing to rain late. High 42F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers early changing to mainly rain showers later on. Low 3C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the evening changing to mainly rain showers overnight. Low 37F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers at times. High 6C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. High 42F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 3C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 38F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 7C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 44F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 4C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 39F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 7C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 44F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low 3C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low 37F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers. High near 5C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mixture of rain and snow showers. High 41F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low 1C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low around 35F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning will become intermittent in the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to rain showers in the afternoon. High 41F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early becoming more scattered later. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the evening. A snow shower or two late - otherwise, mostly cloudy. Low 34F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 40%.
